name: GravDriftr
description:
GravDriftr is a harrowing pursuit through space. Arcade style gameplay and visuals keeps you on your toes as you careen through space, comets, gravity wells, and black holes alike.

Developed for LudumDare 42, GravDriftr was made in 48 hours for the theme "Running out of Space".

Vote for the submission over at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/gravdrifter
